contributionDescription:
We implemented Optimism inside Verso Wallet and released it to all users both on Android and iPhones.
Tested on 50+ mobile devices.

We added following features : 
- Optimism chain to our mobile wallet (50.000 users).
- Swap in Optimism
- Bridge from/to Optimism 
- Configured Optimism tokens in our swap and market data section.

contributionLinks.description: Apple Store link of our Verso Wallet
Google Play link of Verso Wallet

impactDescription:
More than 50k EVM users have now access to Optimism.
Via Verso use can have : 
1/ On-Ramp directly to Optimism with credit card (Apple pay, Google Pay) or wire purchase.
2/ Access to Market data for Optimism tokens.
3/ Swap tokens in Optimism using Paraswap aggregator.
pwCategorySuggestions: Tokenization Platforms, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Wallet Management
